description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment (S96a) to planning permission 216673VAR dated 10.08.2022 "Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition no.2 (approved plans), seeking to allow changes on the design, in pursuant to planning permission reference: 172732FUL dated 18/08/2017 as varied by 178777VAR dated 28/02/2018 for the 'Conversion of two semi-detached dwelling houses into four self-contained flats; two single storey rear extensions; two single storey front porch extensions; two hip to gable roof extensions; two rear roof extensions; installation of four roof lights on the front roof slope; with associated amenity space, cycle and refuse storage'. Variation seeks alteration to the rear amenity space's landscaping, screening and retaining wall". Amendment seeks alteration to the extent of the rainwater Aco drain (retrospective).
decision_conditions: By reason of the resulting drainage issues of the proposed works, the proposal cannot be accepted as non-material amendments to planning permission 216673VAR dated 10.08.2022, in accordance with Section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990) and the Ealing Protocol for Non-Material Amendments following Grant of Planning Permission (2011).
